languages.text: "Этот праздник родом с моего мира, Ифрита. День, когда человек доказывает поступком, что уже созрел и исполнился сердечного благородства. Среди достойных ифратцев этот день почитается больше, чем иные символические даты вроде дня первого крика или дня успения. И мой аммарикар замечательно совпал с возможностью отметить обретение мной Меркатум Табула Официале".

"It is an occasion celebrated on my world, Efreet. It is the day when a person shows, by their actions, that they have reached maturity, that their spirit is ennobled. Among the Efreetian nobility, this day is considered more important than other symbolic events, such as the first cry or the day of repose. And by a wonderful coincidence, my ammaricar happens to fall on the day when I also wish to celebrate my acquisition of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale."
languages.original_text: "Этот праздник родом с моего мира, Ифрита. День, когда человек доказывает поступком, что уже созрел и исполнился сердечного благородства. Среди достойных ифратцев этот день почитается больше, чем иные символические даты вроде дня первого крика или дня успения. И мой аммарикар замечательно совпал с возможностью отметить обретение мной Меркатум Табула Официале".

languages.text: “在我的故乡艾弗里特，及冕礼是个值得庆祝的日子。及冕，指的是人们通过自己的成就，让自己的精神得到了升华，从此正式迈向成熟的人生。在艾弗里特的贵族之中，及冕礼比生日、忌日，或其他象征意味的日子更加重要。而刚巧，我举行及冕礼的日子，就是我打算庆祝正式获得帝国官方行商执照的日子。”
languages.original_text: "It is an occasion celebrated on my world, Efreet. It is the day when a person shows, by their actions, that they have reached maturity, that their spirit is ennobled. Among the Efreetian nobility, this day is considered more important than other symbolic events, such as the first cry or the day of repose. And by a wonderful coincidence, my ammaricar happens to fall on the day when I also wish to celebrate my acquisition of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale."

traits.locale_text: “在我的故乡艾弗里特，及冕礼是个值得庆祝的日子。及冕，指的是人们通过自己的成就，让自己的精神得到了升华，从此正式迈向成熟的人生。在艾弗里特的贵族之中，及冕礼比生日、忌日，或其他象征意味的日子更加重要。而刚巧，我举行及冕礼的日子，就是我打算庆祝正式获得帝国官方行商执照的日子。”

languages.text: 「それはあたしの故郷の惑星であるイフリートでの祝いの日さ。人が成熟し、気高い精神を得たことを行動で示した日なんだ。イフリートの貴族の間では、この日は他の象徴的な行事、例えば産声をあげる日や鎮魂の日よりも重要視されているんだ。そして素晴らしい偶然が重なり、あたしのアンマリカーは、あたしがメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルを手に入れたことを祝いたい日にもなったってわけさ」
languages.original_text: "It is an occasion celebrated on my world, Efreet. It is the day when a person shows, by their actions, that they have reached maturity, that their spirit is ennobled. Among the Efreetian nobility, this day is considered more important than other symbolic events, such as the first cry or the day of repose. And by a wonderful coincidence, my ammaricar happens to fall on the day when I also wish to celebrate my acquisition of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale."

traits.locale_text: 「それはあたしの故郷の惑星であるイフリートでの祝いの日さ。人が成熟し、気高い精神を得たことを行動で示した日なんだ。イフリートの貴族の間では、この日は他の象徴的な行事、例えば産声をあげる日や鎮魂の日よりも重要視されているんだ。そして素晴らしい偶然が重なり、あたしのアンマリカーは、あたしがメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルを手に入れたことを祝いたい日にもなったってわけさ」

languages.text: «Es una ocasión que se celebra en mi mundo, Efreet. Es el día en el que una persona muestra con sus acciones que ha alcanzado la madurez y que su espíritu es noble. Entre la nobleza de Efreet, se considera más importante que otras ocasiones simbólicas como el primer llanto o el día de descanso. Y además, da la maravillosa casualidad de que mi ammaricar coincide con el día en el que quiero celebrar mi adquisición de la Mercatum Tabula Officiale».
languages.original_text: "It is an occasion celebrated on my world, Efreet. It is the day when a person shows, by their actions, that they have reached maturity, that their spirit is ennobled. Among the Efreetian nobility, this day is considered more important than other symbolic events, such as the first cry or the day of repose. And by a wonderful coincidence, my ammaricar happens to fall on the day when I also wish to celebrate my acquisition of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale."

traits.locale_text: «Es una ocasión que se celebra en mi mundo, Efreet. Es el día en el que una persona muestra con sus acciones que ha alcanzado la madurez y que su espíritu es noble. Entre la nobleza de Efreet, se considera más importante que otras ocasiones simbólicas como el primer llanto o el día de descanso. Y además, da la maravillosa casualidad de que mi ammaricar coincide con el día en el que quiero celebrar mi adquisición de la Mercatum Tabula Officiale».

languages.text: « C'est un événement que nous célébrons chez moi, sur Éfrit. Il s'agit du jour où une personne montre, par ses actes, qu'elle a atteint la maturité et que son esprit s'est anobli. Dans l'aristocratie, on considère ce moment plus important que bien d'autres occasions symboliques, comme les premiers pleurs ou le jour de la mort. Et par une incroyable coïncidence, mon ammaricar tombe le jour où je souhaite célébrer mon acquisition de la Mercatum Tabula Officiale. »
languages.original_text: "It is an occasion celebrated on my world, Efreet. It is the day when a person shows, by their actions, that they have reached maturity, that their spirit is ennobled. Among the Efreetian nobility, this day is considered more important than other symbolic events, such as the first cry or the day of repose. And by a wonderful coincidence, my ammaricar happens to fall on the day when I also wish to celebrate my acquisition of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un événement que nous célébrons chez moi, sur Éfrit. Il s'agit du jour où une personne montre, par ses actes, qu'elle a atteint la maturité et que son esprit s'est anobli. Dans l'aristocratie, on considère ce moment plus important que bien d'autres occasions symboliques, comme les premiers pleurs ou le jour de la mort. Et par une incroyable coïncidence, mon ammaricar tombe le jour où je souhaite célébrer mon acquisition de la Mercatum Tabula Officiale. »

languages.text: "Ein Anlass, den wir auf meiner Welt Efreet feiern. Es ist der Tag, an dem jemand durch seine Taten zeigt, dass er oder sie herangereift ist, dass sein und ihr Geist Veredlung gefunden hat. Beim Adel in Efreet wird dieser Tag als wichtiger als andere symbolische Ereignisse angesehen, so wie der erste Schrei oder der Tag der Erholung. Und wie es der Zufall so will, fällt mein Ammaricar genau auf den Tag, an dem ich auch meinen Besitz der Mercatum Tabula Officiale feiern möchte."
languages.original_text: "It is an occasion celebrated on my world, Efreet. It is the day when a person shows, by their actions, that they have reached maturity, that their spirit is ennobled. Among the Efreetian nobility, this day is considered more important than other symbolic events, such as the first cry or the day of repose. And by a wonderful coincidence, my ammaricar happens to fall on the day when I also wish to celebrate my acquisition of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Anlass, den wir auf meiner Welt Efreet feiern. Es ist der Tag, an dem jemand durch seine Taten zeigt, dass er oder sie herangereift ist, dass sein und ihr Geist Veredlung gefunden hat. Beim Adel in Efreet wird dieser Tag als wichtiger als andere symbolische Ereignisse angesehen, so wie der erste Schrei oder der Tag der Erholung. Und wie es der Zufall so will, fällt mein Ammaricar genau auf den Tag, an dem ich auch meinen Besitz der Mercatum Tabula Officiale feiern möchte."

languages.text: "Dünyam İfrit'te kutlanan bir gün. Kişinin; sergilediği eylemlerle olgunluğa eriştiğini, ruhunun yüceleştiğini gösterdiği gündür. İfrit soyluları arasında ilk ağlama günü veya sükûnet günü gibi tüm diğer sembolik günlerden daha önemli kabul edilir. Ne harika bir tesadüftür ki ammarikarım, Mercatum Tabula Officiale'yi alışımı kutlamak istediğim günle aynı güne denk geliyor."
languages.original_text: "It is an occasion celebrated on my world, Efreet. It is the day when a person shows, by their actions, that they have reached maturity, that their spirit is ennobled. Among the Efreetian nobility, this day is considered more important than other symbolic events, such as the first cry or the day of repose. And by a wonderful coincidence, my ammaricar happens to fall on the day when I also wish to celebrate my acquisition of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale."

traits.locale_text: "Dünyam İfrit'te kutlanan bir gün. Kişinin, yaptığı eylemlerle olgunluğa eriştiğini, ruhunun yüceleştiğini gösterdiği gündür. İfrit soyluları arasında, ilk ağlama günü veya sükûnet günü gibi tüm diğer sembolik günlerden daha önemli olarak görülür. Ve ne kadar harika bir tesadüftür ki, ammarikarım, Mercatum Tabula Officiale'yi alışımı kutlamak istediğim günle aynı güne denk geliyor."
